t_bommel wrote:

>hey ken,
>
>yeah i read you're paper and looked over it several more times. i 
>guess what i don't understand is how exactly the camera's work. for 
>example, how are they coded to take in information and how does the 
>distance to the object only come down to one input into the neural 
>network.

>timmy

Hi,

If you have MS-Windows take a look at my Prey Capture simulator exe. It 
demonstrates the radar sensor idea nicely, although there is only one 
'thing' to sense - the single item of prey that we are trying to catch. 
The source code is also available to look...

http://www.cgreen.dsl.pipex.com/releases.htm

Colin.
